item.title: Kubernetes Architecture
item.description:
A kubernetes cluster is made up of one or more control plane and worker nodes.

Control Plane

Components of control plane are,

  • kube-apiserver
  • etcd
  • controller manager
  • kube-scheduler

Worker Nodes

Components of a worker node are,

  • kubelet
  • kube proxy
  • container runtime
